title: Energy Chiropractic Center - Riverside, CA
description: 26 reviews of Energy Chiropractic Center "My low back was hurting from a automobile accident. I could not sleep, bend or cough with out extreme pain. The pain went from my low back to my leg. I was seen by Dr. Mike Rodriguez the same day I made an appointment. His front office was soooo helpful. They helped me contact my insurance carrier and get my claim number they made my appointments and Dr. Mike was the best...... He examined me, when over the findings of my injury and gave me a treatment plan. Within a couple of days my low back pain was almost gone and I have no pain down my leg at all. Two weeks ago I thought this was going to be a long affair. I am back to work and continuing to see Dr. Mike and his staff. I continue to get better and better. I would not hesitate sending anyone to Dr. Rodriguez's office.."
